sys_update_version.name: sys_ui_script_e8a5f6ad2f825110b2ab3f96f699b69b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><ignore_in_now_experience>false</ignore_in_now_experience><name>x_847697_serviceno.test.js</name><script><![CDATA[var configItemUtility = new GlideAjax('configurationIteamClientUtility');
var configurationItem = 'PC';

configItemUtility.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getConfiguratonIteamPriceData');
configItemUtility.addParam('sysparm_configurationItem', configurationItem);
configItemUtility.getXMLAnswer(
    function(answer) {
        if (answer) {
            var parsed = JSON.parse(answer);
            var ctx = document.getElementById('myChart').getContext('2d');

            var prices = parsed[prices];
            var labels = parsed.dates;
            var ciName = 'PC';

            var myChart = new Chart(ctx, {
                type: 'line',
                data: {
                    labels: labels,
                    datasets: [{
                        label: 'Price track of ' + ciName,
                        data: prices,
                        backgroundColor: [
                            'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)',
                            'rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)',
                            'rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.2)',
                            'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.2)',
                            'rgba(153, 102, 255, 0.2)',
                            'rgba(255, 159, 64, 0.2)'
                        ],
                        borderColor: [
                            'rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)',
                            'rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)',
                            'rgba(255, 206, 86, 1)',
                            'rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)',
                            'rgba(153, 102, 255, 1)',
                            'rgba(255, 159, 64, 1)'
                        ],
                        borderWidth: 1
                    }]
                },
                options: {
                    scales: {
                        y: {
                            beginAtZero: true
                        }
                    }
                }
            });

        }
    });


// var labels = [
//     'Price',
// ];



// var data = {
//     labels: labels,
//     datasets: [{
//         label: 'Price',
//         fill: true,
//         backgroundColor: 'rgb(255, 99, 132)',
//         borderColor: 'rgb(255, 99, 132)',
//         data: ['2', '3', '4'],
//     }]
// };



// var config = {
//     type: 'line',
//     data: data,
//     options: {}
// };
// var myChart = new Chart(
//     document.getElementById('myChart'),
//     config
// );]]></script><script_name>test.js</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-20 07:10:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>e8a5f6ad2f825110b2ab3f96f699b69b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_847697_serviceno.test.js</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ServiceNowTasks" source="x_847697_serviceno">b979020a2f9d1110b2ab3f96f699b655</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNowTasks">b979020a2f9d1110b2ab3f96f699b655</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_e8a5f6ad2f825110b2ab3f96f699b69b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-20 08:32:01</sys_updated_on><ui_type>0</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
